name: PIJUMP
description:
README:

PIJUMP:

A short game made for MiniJam95. There are 10 obstacles tied to the ten unique digits. They come in a preset pattern based on the constant PI (hence; PIJUMP!) If you have the skills, you can make it up to 100 digits of PI!

A Game by Dae and Charlie

Art by Dae (https://twitter.com/daenosaurus)

Programming by Charlie https://twitter.com/defuncting)

Music: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/

RULES:

The control key is based on the number presented in the top-right, corresponding to the next digit in PI.  As such, actions are only valid if the key you press matches the digit.

OBSTACLES:

0: Don't touch anything.

1: 1 Platform

2: 2 Platform

3: Hole-Vault

4: Rock-Vault

5: Electric Fence

6: Mountain Climb

7: Dodge the Laser (watch for four pulses of the base beam, and then JUMP!)

8: At the very edge before the hole, jump and HOLD.

9: Click (9) five times.

Enjoy!
